task.name: hif_makecutoutimages

param.name: vis
param.description:
List of visibility data files. These may be ASDMs, tar files of ASDMs, MSs, or tar files of MSs. If ASDM files are specified, they will be converted to MS format. (can be set only in 'interactive mode')
example: vis=['X227.ms', 'asdms.tar.gz']

param.name: offsetblc
param.shortdescription: -x and -y offsets to the bottom lower corner (blc) in arcseconds

param.name: offsettrc

param.description: +x and +y offsets to the top right corner (trc) in arcseconds (can be set in any pipeline mode)

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task. (can be set in any pipeline mode)

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or display task command (True)
param.description: Run the commands (False) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (True).
